Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2015 06:49AM superius wrote: I had a Mastectomy due to my breast size. Clean Margin, Lymph node -ve. ER/PR+, Fish -ve. Dr highly recommended Chemo due to my age (42) & Oncotype being at 27, the high end of the grey zone. So that's what I'm doing. So far I had 1 session of TC (3 more rounds). & of course, there will be Hormonal Therapy afterward.
Posts.Title: Anybody have stage 2B IDC Cancer with very low oncotype score? annabananas AKJ

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2015 05:16PM superius wrote: Hello, I just finished chemo couple weeks ago & now reading up on Recon. I had been asked by multiple people (including Doctors) if I have thought about it (I haven't). When people talk about balance, are they talking about posture or just look? What I read about Recon (just basic information) is pretty scary - multiple surgeries, many months... If it's just for appearance, I am pretty ok with the camisoles I got from after surgery. I also got couple sport bras with removable pads, which I doubled up, that's it, barely notice the difference (I don't I'm even a B) If it's about posture. What are the concerns? I haven't found information about that...
